Job Posting:171728 - Position: F25 Software Engineer Intern 171728B E1 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 09/08/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 08/25/2025 11:09 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country ACE 1 Media Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2025 - Fall F25 Software Engineer Intern 171728B E1 Co-op Position Vancouver, BC Canada 4 or 8 months Fully Remote Salary Currency CAD Salary Salary Range $ Job Description 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $20 - $22 About the job Software Engineer Intern Location: Vancouver, BC (Remote) Position: Software Engineer Intern Salary: $20-22 per hour Term Duration: preferably 8 months About the Role Ace1 Media is looking for a passionate and motivated Software Engineer Intern to join our development team. This is a hands-on internship where youll gain real-world experience working on high-traffic web applications that support digital content and advertising delivery. Youll be mentored by our Lead Developer/CTO and contribute to meaningful technical projects that support business growth. What Youll Do Assist in developing and maintaining full-stack web applications • • Help implement new features based on design and product requirements • Support performance optimization for user experience, SEO, and ad delivery • Learn how to integrate APIs (e.g., Google Ads, analytics, etc.) • Participate in code reviews, daily stand-ups, and sprint planning • Help monitor application performance and report bugs What You'll Gain • Hands-on experience working on production-level applications • Mentorship from experienced developers and technical leads • Exposure to modern web technologies and scalable architecture • Flexible remote work experience with a Vancouver-based team Potential for long-term engagement or full-time employment after internship • Job Requirements What Were Looking For Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field • • Some experience (academic, personal projects, or previous internships) with full-stack development • Familiarity with the following technologies is a plus: • JavaScript/TypeScript • React, Node.js • Next.js • PostgreSQL or other relational databases • A basic understanding of version control tools like Git • • Strong problem-solving and communication skills Eagerness to learn, take initiative, and work in a remote team environment Nice to Have (But Not Required) Experience with cloud platforms like Azure or AWS • • Interest in SEO, web performance, or digital advertising • Familiarity with tools like Playwright for testing • Exposure to media processing tools like FFMPEG Curiosity about analytics, Google Ads, or content monetization • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://www.careers-page.com/ace1media/job/L55XVR85 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
